titleStmt.title: The humble petition of the commons of the City of London in Common Councel assembled, to the Honorable, the Commons of England in Parliament assembled. With a narrative of the proceedings of the Court of Common-Councel: and the vote of the House of Parliament, and their answer thereupon. Together with Colonel Titchborn's speech, made in the Honorable House of Commons at the delivery of the said petition and narrative. Ordered by the Commons ... that this petition ... be forthwith printed ...
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.
Tichborne, Henry, Sir, 1581?-1667.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Peter Cole, at the sign of the Printing-Press in Cornhil, at the Royal Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Both petition and reply are dated 15 Jan. 1648[/9].
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the sign of the Printing-Press in Cornhil, at the Royal Exchange
